amendment.description: Amendment, as modified, increases funding for biotechnology risk assessment grants from 1 percent to 3 percent of outlays for USDA biotechnology research.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 38 printed in the Congressional Record to increase the amount of the bill's biotech research budget dedicated to assessing the risks of biotech products from 1% to 10%.

action.text: Kucinich amendment (A041) modified by unanimous consent. The modification changes the proposed increase from 10% to 3%.
On agreeing to the Kucinich amendment (A041) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
